verses.text: O sing unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** a new song: sing unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, all the earth.
Sing unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, bless his name; shew forth his salvation from day to day.
Declare his glory among the heathen, his wonders among all people.
For the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* great, and greatly to be praised: he is* to be feared above all gods.
For all the gods of the nations are* idols: but the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** made the heavens.
Honour and majesty are* before him: strength and beauty are* in his sanctuary.
Give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, O ye kindreds of the people, give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** glory and strength.
Give unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** the glory due unto* his name: bring an offering, and come into his courts.+ 96.8 due…: Heb. of his name*
O worship the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** in the beauty of holiness: fear before him, all the earth.+ 96.9 in the…: or, in the glorious sanctuary*
Say among the heathen that* the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** reigneth: the world also shall be established that it shall not be moved: he shall judge the people righteously.
Let the heavens rejoice, and let the earth be glad; let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof.+ 96.11 the fulness…: or, all it containeth*
Let the field be joyful, and all that is* therein: then shall all the trees of the wood rejoice
Before the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: for he cometh, for he cometh to judge the earth: he shall judge the world with righteousness, and the people with his truth.
